summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PMC Snag List web app improvements: dashboard charts, pagination, and image compression features all working correctly
passed_tests: Dashboard displays pie chart for status distribution
Dashboard displays bar chart for snags by building
Dashboard shows correct statistics (16 total snags, 5 high priority)
Snags page pagination shows 'Showing X to Y of Z results' text
Items per page dropdown works (10, 25, 50, 100 options)
Photo upload section shows 'Images will be auto-compressed' message
All backend API endpoints working (10/10 tests passed)
Create snag modal opens and functions properly
Camera and Gallery photo upload buttons present
